TODO - gaschooldata pkgdown build issues

Source: TODO.md

Network Timeout Error (2026-01-01)

The pkgdown build is failing due to network connectivity issues when trying to check CRAN/Bioconductor links.

Error Details

Error in `httr2::req_perform(req)`:
! Failed to perform HTTP request.
Caused by error in `curl::curl_fetch_memory()`:
! Timeout was reached [cloud.r-project.org]:
Connection timed out after 10001 milliseconds

Stack Trace

The failure occurs in: 1. pkgdown::build_site() 2. pkgdown:::data_home_sidebar_links(pkg) 3. pkgdown:::cran_link(pkg$package) 4. httr2::req_perform(req)

Notes

  • This is a transient network issue, not a package configuration problem
  • The package does not have vignettes, so no vignette-related fixes are needed
  • ICMP ping to cloud.r-project.org works, but HTTP requests via httr2/curl are timing out
  • This may be related to firewall/proxy settings or curl library configuration
  • Try running the build again when network conditions improve
  • The GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow should succeed if run on GitHub’s infrastructure
